tha-ap177:1.4_0: I was struck with a sense of urgency.
tha-ap177:2.1_0: Those the fragrance of the fairies,
tha-ap177:2.2_0: For the welfare and happiness of life,
tha-ap177:3.2_0: I paid homage at the supreme being intent on awakening,
tha-ap177:3.4_0: that leads to a bad place.
tha-ap177:4.1_0: In the fifteenth day I became one fifteen,
tha-ap177:4.2_0: the eight eons of the eon
tha-ap177:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap177:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Rohitassa.
tha-ap177:7.1_0: Five senior monks who were friends, companions, and associates with the senior monks.
